Enums/CurveError.html#/s:10Curve2551910C.name: keyLength
Enums/CurveError.html#/s:10Curve2551910C.abstract: The private/public key has less than 32 byte

Classes/Curve25519.html#/s:10Curve25519A.name: keyLength
Classes/Curve25519.html#/s:10Curve25519A.abstract: The length of the private and public key in bytes

Classes/Curve25519.html#/s:10Curve25519A.name: signatureLength
Classes/Curve25519.html#/s:10Curve25519A.abstract: The length of a signature in bytes

Classes/Curve25519.html#/s:10Curve25519A.name: randomLength
Classes/Curve25519.html#/s:10Curve25519A.abstract: The number of random bytes needed for signing

Classes/Curve25519.html#/s:10Curve25519A.name: vrfSignatureLength
Classes/Curve25519.html#/s:10Curve25519A.abstract: The length of a VRF signature in bytes

Classes/Curve25519.html#/s:10Curve25519A.name: vrfRandomLength
Classes/Curve25519.html#/s:10Curve25519A.abstract: The number of random bytes needed for signing

Classes/Curve25519.html#/s:10Curve25519A.name: vrfVerifyLength
Classes/Curve25519.html#/s:10Curve25519A.abstract: The length of the VRF verification output in bytes

Classes/Curve25519.html#/s:10Curve25519A.name: publicKey(for:basepoint:)
Classes/Curve25519.html#/s:10Curve25519A.abstract: Generate a public key from a given private key.

Classes/Curve25519.html#/s:10Curve25519A.name: signature(for:privateKey:randomData:)
Classes/Curve25519.html#/s:10Curve25519A.abstract: Calculate the signature for the given message.

Classes/Curve25519.html#/s:10Curve25519A.name: vrfSignature(for:privateKey:randomData:)
Classes/Curve25519.html#/s:10Curve25519A.abstract: Calculates a unique Curve25519 signature for the private key

Classes/Curve25519.html#/s:10Curve25519A.name: verify(signature:for:publicKey:)
Classes/Curve25519.html#/s:10Curve25519A.abstract: Verify that the signature corresponds to the message.

Classes/Curve25519.html#/s:10Curve25519A.name: verify(vrfSignature:for:publicKey:)
Classes/Curve25519.html#/s:10Curve25519A.abstract: Verify that the vrf signature corresponds to the message.

Classes/Curve25519.html#/s:10Curve25519A.name: calculateAgreement(privateKey:publicKey:)
Classes/Curve25519.html#/s:10Curve25519A.abstract: Calculate the shared agreement between a private key and a public key.

Classes/Curve25519.html.name: Curve25519
Classes/Curve25519.html.abstract: Curve25519 provides access to elliptic curve signature, agreement and verification functions.
